samples.title: Excel - Get Started with the Dev Kit
samples.shortDescription: A basic Excel task pane Add-in using JavaScript to help you get started with the Office Add-ins Development Kit.
samples.fullDescription: This sample demonstrates how to create a basic Excel add-in with a task pane that uses JavaScript.

samples.title: Word - Get Started with the Dev Kit
samples.shortDescription: A basic Word task pane Add-in using JavaScript to help you get started with the Office Add-ins Development Kit.
samples.fullDescription: This sample demonstrates how to create a simple Word task pane Add-in using JavaScript.
